meanings.definition: Pyknotic: having a dense or compact structure
meanings.sent1: The pyknotic rock formation stood strong against the wind.
meanings.sent2: The suitcase was pyknotic, making it easy to carry around.
meanings.sent3: The pyknotic puzzle pieces fit perfectly together.
meanings.sent4: Her pyknotic hair was neatly tied in a bun.
meanings.sent5: The pyknotic forest was a maze of intertwined branches.

meanings.definition: Pyknotic: showing condensed chromatin in a cell nucleus
meanings.sent1: Under the microscope, the pyknotic cell nucleus appeared dark and compact.
meanings.sent2: The biologist observed the pyknotic nuclei in the tissue sample.
meanings.sent3: The pyknotic nucleus looked like a tiny galaxy under the lens.
meanings.sent4: The pyknotic chromatin resembled a tightly wound thread.
meanings.sent5: The pyknotic nucleus was a dense core of genetic material.
